testCases.description: Verify hero section displays with correct branding
testCases.expectedResult: Hero section visible with Fastenr branding and tagline

testCases.description: Test all navigation links in header
testCases.expectedResult: All links navigate to correct pages

testCases.description: Test "Start Free Trial" button,Redirects to signup page,High,Primary conversion action,
Test "Watch Demo" link,Navigates to /watch-demo page,Medium,Secondary CTA,

testCases.expectedResult: All feature cards visible with icons and descriptions
Team members show with photos and roles
Error messages show for empty required fields
Form submits and creates demo request

testCases.description: Test "Speak with Team" button,Button tracks interest and redirects to contact,Medium,Lead qualification,

testCases.expectedResult: Blog posts display with titles and excerpts
Docs menu and links work correctly
User can login with valid credentials
Error message shows for invalid login

testCases.description: Test social login buttons if available
Test redirect to dashboard after login

testCases.expectedResult: Redirects to dashboard if already logged in
Terms must be accepted to proceed
Demo tracking ID preserved through signup
User profile created with required information
Key metrics and stats show correctly

testCases.description: Test stats cards (accounts total health etc)
testCases.expectedResult: All stat cards display with correct data
Chart displays churn risk data correctly
Quick actions navigate to correct pages

testCases.description: Test admin panel access for admin users
testCases.expectedResult: Admin users can access admin panel

testCases.description: Test user profile section in sidebar
testCases.expectedResult: User name and email display correctly
User successfully logs out and redirects to login
All accounts show with correct data
Filters work correctly (health score status etc)
Columns sort correctly (name health score etc)
Button navigates to new account form

testCases.description: Test account action buttons (view edit delete)

testCases.expectedResult: Health scores display with correct colors/indicators
Account saved and user redirected appropriately
Edit button navigates to edit form

testCases.description: Test new engagement creation from account

testCases.expectedResult: Notes display and can be edited

testCases.description: Test form pre-fills with existing data

testCases.expectedResult: All contacts show with correct information
Multiple contacts can be selected and acted upon
All engagements show with correct data
Filter by meeting call email etc works
Can filter engagements by specific account
Edit button navigates to edit form
Can create engagement by clicking date

testCases.description: Test calendar view options (month week day)

testCases.expectedResult: Status shows correctly (on track at risk etc)
Survey shows as recipients will see it
Analytics charts and metrics show correctly
Data tables display with correct information
Can filter analytics by date range
All accounts show with health scores
All invoices display with correct data
Invoices can be downloaded as PDF
Can invite new users to organization
Email templates display and can be edited
All organizations show with billing status
Can generate invoices for multiple orgs
Can generate invoices for specific orgs

testCases.description: Test invoice list in org details
testCases.expectedResult: Invoices show correctly in org modal
